languages.text: Темный металл пирамиды почти не отражает энергетическое сияние луча. Изредка по поверхности стен пробегает едва заметная волна, после которой материал кажется еще более гладким, будто вместо разрушения один монолит подпитывает другой. Несколько разведчиков решаются подобраться ближе, чтобы рассмотреть феномен.

traits.locale_text: Темный металл пирамиды почти не отражает энергетическое сияние луча. Изредка по поверхности стен пробегает едва заметная волна, после которой материал кажется еще более гладким, будто вместо разрушения один монолит подпитывает другой. Несколько разведчиков решаются подобраться ближе, чтобы рассмотреть феномен.

languages.text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.
languages.original_text: Темный металл пирамиды почти не отражает энергетическое сияние луча. Изредка по поверхности стен пробегает едва заметная волна, после которой материал кажется еще более гладким, будто вместо разрушения один монолит подпитывает другой. Несколько разведчиков решаются подобраться ближе, чтобы рассмотреть феномен.

traits.locale_text: The energy beam is barely reflected in the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a barely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material seems even smoother. Instead of destroying, it's as if one monolith is feeding the other. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

The energy beam is barely reflected in the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a barely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material seems even smoother. Instead of destroying, it's as if one monolith is feeding the other. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

languages.text: 能量束几乎完全没有在金字塔的黑色金属表面反射出任何光芒。某种几乎看不见的波浪，偶尔会掠过这座巨型建筑表面。随后，这座建筑的表面似乎变得更加光滑了，看起来就像是其中一座巨型建筑并没有在摧毁另一座巨型建筑，而是在修复它。为了更好地观察这样的现象，一群侦察兵决定靠近些。
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

traits.locale_text: 能量束几乎完全没有在金字塔的黑色金属表面反射出任何光芒。某种几乎看不见的波浪，偶尔会掠过这座巨型建筑表面。随后，这座建筑的表面似乎变得更加光滑了，看起来就像是其中一座巨型建筑并没有在摧毁另一座巨型建筑，而是在修复它。为了更好地观察这样的现象，一群侦察兵决定靠近些。

languages.text: エネルギービームはピラミッドの暗い金属にかすかに反射している。時折、モノリスの壁の表面をほぼ目に見えぬほどの波が走るが、その後の素材は今まで以上に滑らかになったように見える。まるで、一方のモノリスがもう一方のモノリスを破壊するのではなく、力を与えているかのようだ。偵察隊の数人は、この現象をもっと良く調べるために近づいてみることにした。
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

traits.locale_text: エネルギービームはピラミッドの暗い金属にかすかに反射している。時折、モノリスの壁の表面をほぼ目に見えぬほどの波が走るが、その後の素材は今まで以上に滑らかになったように見える。まるで、一方のモノリスがもう一方のモノリスを破壊するのではなく、力を与えているかのようだ。偵察隊の数人は、この現象をもっと良く調べるために近づいてみることにした。

languages.text: El haz de energía apenas se refleja en el metal oscuro de la pirámide. De vez en cuando, una onda apenas visible recorre la superficie de las paredes del monolito, tras lo cual el material parece volverse aún más liso. Es como si un monolito alimentara al otro en lugar de destruirlo. Algunos exploradores deciden acercarse para examinar mejor el fenómeno.
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

traits.locale_text: El haz de energía apenas se refleja en el metal oscuro de la pirámide. De vez en cuando, una onda apenas visible recorre la superficie de las paredes del monolito, tras lo cual el material parece volverse aún más liso. Es como si un monolito alimentara al otro en lugar de destruirlo. Algunos exploradores deciden acercarse para examinar mejor el fenómeno.

languages.text: Der Energiestrahl wird vom dunklen Metall der Pyramide kaum reflektiert. Gelegentlich läuft eine fast nicht wahrzunehmende Welle über die Oberfläche der Wände des Monoliths. Danach wirkt das Material sogar noch glatter. Es ist, als würde der eine Monolith den anderen speisen, nicht zerstören. Ein paar Kundschafter beschließen, näher heranzugehen, um das Phänomen besser untersuchen zu können.
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

traits.locale_text: Der Energiestrahl wird vom dunklen Metall der Pyramide kaum reflektiert. Gelegentlich läuft eine fast nicht wahrzunehmende Welle über die Oberfläche der Wände des Monoliths. Danach wirkt das Material sogar noch glatter. Es ist, als würde der eine Monolith den anderen speisen, nicht zerstören. Ein paar Kundschafter beschließen, näher heranzugehen, um das Phänomen besser untersuchen zu können.

languages.text: Le métal sombre de la pyramide semble absorber presque complètement le rayon d'énergie. De temps à autre, une onde tout juste visible parcourt la surface de ses parois, après quoi le matériau semble devenir encore plus lisse. Tout porte à croire que le premier monolithe a pour fonction d'alimenter le second, et non pas de le détruire. Quelques éclaireurs décident d'aller observer le phénomène d'encore plus près.
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.

traits.locale_text: Le métal sombre de la pyramide semble absorber presque complètement le rayon d'énergie. De temps à autre, une onde tout juste visible parcourt la surface de ses parois, après quoi le matériau semble devenir encore plus lisse. Tout porte à croire que le premier monolithe a pour fonction d'alimenter le second, et non pas de le détruire. Quelques éclaireurs décident d'aller observer le phénomène d'encore plus près.

languages.text: Piramidin koyu renkli metali, enerji ışınını neredeyse tamamen emiyor gibi görünüyor. Zaman zaman duvarlarının yüzeyinden zar zor görülebilen bir dalga geçip yapıyı daha da pürüzsüz kılıyor. Sanki bir monolit, bir diğerini yok etmek yerine ona güç veriyor. Birkaç keşif eri, bu olayı daha yakından gözlemlemeye karar veriyor.
languages.original_text: The energy beam barely reflects off the dark metal of the pyramid. Occasionally, a scarcely visible wave runs across the surface of the monolith's walls, after which the material appears to become even smoother. It's as if one monolith is feeding the other, not destroying it. A few scouts decide to come closer in order to better examine the phenomenon.
